message:
Spoke of India's old relations with IMF & IMF's role in helping in policy making at #AdvancingAsia conference. Talked at length about two issues- 'Why Asia' & 'How India.' Highlighted India's economic potential & key reforms our Govt is initiating.

My dream is of a transformed India along with an advanced Asia, where people live with happiness & fulfilment. http://nm-4.com/rgyi
